main event: A civilian reported observing a circular object in the sky in Redwood City, California on 2 November 1964 for about 30 minutes during the daytime.
interesting points: The object was described as circular and about 20 feet in diameter., The observer noted that the object's color varied from white to orange., The object hovered and moved up and down with no visible means of propulsion., There was reportedly no sound associated with the object., The object's visibility was affected by atmospheric conditions like temperature inversions.
sighted object: circular object approximately 20 feet in diameter
witness description: Civilian; claims prior service in the Air Force and is a former member of the Ground Observer Corps.
